mention.text: the alleged front man of the medellin cartel and brother of a former colombian attorney general
cordoba department , approximately 500 km northwest of bogota
a landing strip in which a `` turbocommander 2000 '' -- stolen by drug traffickers from a colombian air force base in bogota -- had landed on 2 march 1988
the brother of alfredo gutierrez , who was appointed attorney general of colombia following the murder of carlos mauro hoyos on 25 january 1988
the owner of the farm and landing strip used by the drug traffickers
alfredo gutierrez , who was appointed attorney general of colombia following the murder of carlos mauro hoyos on 25 january 1988
attorney general of colombia following the murder of carlos mauro hoyos on 25 january 1988
the murder of carlos mauro hoyos on 25 january 1988
a front man for pablo escobar , attorney general alfredo gutierrez
